help-file.title: STANCES
help-file.content:
Syntax: <stance none|offensive|defensive>
A player can make use of stances to increase his defensive and offensive capabilities when fighting. The offensive stance will raise all skills flagged offensive by a set number and all defensive skills will be lowered by the same number. The reverse is used when going into the defensive stance. Stances are later used when dealing with group formations and will then deal other bonuses depending on which formation was chosen.
If someone other than the group leader, which is defined by the person everyone follows, uses a stance while the group is not in formation then that person will not be able to follow the group leader.
Something that should be noted when using stances is that it affects the skill dodge. A high skill in dodge will make the character harder to bash and this value goes up if you are in defensive stances and it goes down if you are in offensive stance.
